get.description:
특정 이력서를 위한 실시간 추천 생성

GET /api/v1/recommendations/for-resume/<resume_id>/?limit=10

Args:
    resume_id: 이력서 ID (URL 파라미터)
    limit: 반환할 추천 개수 (쿼리 파라미터, 기본값 10)

Returns:
    실시간 생성된 추천 공고 리스트

특정 사용자를 위한 실시간 추천 생성

GET /api/v1/recommendations/for-user/<user_id>/?limit=10
Search job postings using vector similarity.

post.description: Search job postings using both vector similarity and skill matching.

get.description: Get job postings related to a specific skill using Graph DB.

post.description: Login with email and password to get JWT tokens.

Takes a set of user credentials and returns an access and refresh JSON web
token pair to prove the authentication of those credentials.

Takes a refresh type JSON web token and returns an access type JSON web
token if the refresh token is valid.
